channel.title: Events on The openMobility working group will drive the evolution and broad adoption of mobility modelling and simulation technologies.
channel.description: Recent content in Events on The openMobility working group will drive the evolution and broad adoption of mobility modelling and simulation technologies.

item.title: SUMO User Conference 2019
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: This international conference about Eclipse SUMO is intended for participants from the industry, practitioners as well as academic researchers. It aims on presenting new and unique results in the field of mobility simulation and modelling using openly available tools and data. We expect a large variety of research topics and usage approaches.

item.title: openMobility Working Group Kick-Off
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: Kick-Off meeting for the openMobility Working Group during the SUMO User Conference 2019.
